ygData.subject: Re: No More Sash Cheats...
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe he asks you to bring back Dareb. If you ask him about Dareb (or whoever he told youto bring back) he will explain that one went looking for another
ygData.messageBody:
I believe he asks you to bring back Dareb. If you ask
him about Dareb (or whoever he told youto bring back)
he will explain that one went looking for another monk
and that if they perished to bring back their remains
so that they can be honored with burial. You shouldn't
need to speak with anyone else. Good journeys and my
truth guide you.
Brother Kingdok
Ashen Order monk of Twentieth Season on Erollisi Marr
Man at Arms of Magius Knights
Desperately seeking surname

--- "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...> wrote:
> From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>
>
> I'm a fp monk who recently went to qeynos and back
> (to get my white-orange
> sash, and to travel the world some). I thought when
> I smacked the gnolls
> in bb, that it gave faction to the fp monk guild. I
> know they gave me
> faction to the silent fist clan.
>
> one question. for the red headband, I know you need
> 3 heads from paw.
> but when I asked about the red headband, all the guy
> said was to find
> brother someone, and bring them back to the guild
> (not tomer, did that).
> am I supposed to talk to someone and find out that
> that guy is dead, then
> get a new quest?
